column4: when you use two cards of the same model, you can use something like SLI technology to pair them and make them work in sync. how can you use two different cards and expect them to work properly together?
I don't know, that's why I was asking. So it seems the only alternative would be to install a second nVidia GT220 perhaps
afaik, yes. then you can use an SLI bridge to connect both the cards.
